actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-849.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5503 to amend titles 10 and 37, United States Code, relating to the appointment, promotion, separation, and retirement of members of the armed forces, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 5503 (Armed forces appointment, promotion, separation, and retirement).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5503 to amend titles 10 and 37, United States Code, relating to the appointment, promotion, separation, and retirement of members of the armed forces, and for other purposes.
